name: Break The Rematch Part 2
description: Break The Rematch Part 2 is finally back as promised. This time around, we will cover the rest of the characters that were not featured in Part 1 and we will also have a brand new character that will be joining us in the second part. With valued feedback received from players of the first part, we will be making huge improvements to the CG, story, and provide an overall better gameplay experience for the second part of the saga.
